form.label: HA groups overview
form.description: This dashboard shows the status of the HA group consumers - a consumer will be considered offline if it has not sent a keep alive during the last 10 minutes

search.query: | inputlookup mq_publish_ha_groups | eval key=_key | fields key, ha_group_name, ha_group_elected_manager, ha_registered_consumers, ha_group_election_mtime | eval epoch_ha_group_election_mtime=ha_group_election_mtime, ha_group_election_mtime=strftime(ha_group_election_mtime, "%c")
makemv delim="," ha_registered_consumers | mvexpand ha_registered_consumers | stats count by ha_group_name, ha_registered_consumers
| inputlookup mq_publish_ha_consumers_keepalive | eval status=if(now()-mtime>=10*60, "offline", "online") | stats count by status
makemv delim="," ha_registered_consumers | stats dc(ha_registered_consumers) as dcount
where status="online" | stats sum(count) as count | append [ |makeresults | eval count=0 | fields - _time ] | head 1
where status="offline" | stats sum(count) as count | append [ |makeresults | eval count=0 | fields - _time ] | head 1

panel.title: Search for HA groups and consumers:

search.query: | stats count by ha_group_name | sort 0 ha_group_name
| stats count by ha_registered_consumers | sort 0 ha_registered_consumers

eval status=if(ha_group_elected_manager!="none", "✅ operational", "❌ degraded") | eval consumer_name=ha_registered_consumers | makemv delim="," consumer_name | search $tk_ha_group_name$ $tk_ha_registered_consumer$ | fields - ha_registered_consumer | fields status, ha_group_name, ha_group_elected_manager, ha_registered_consumers, ha_group_election_mtime

| inputlookup mq_publish_ha_consumers_keepalive | search $tk_ha_group_name$ $tk_ha_registered_consumer$ | eval status=if(now()-mtime>=10*60, "❌ offline", "✅ online") | eval duration_since_last=tostring(now()-mtime, "duration"), mtime=strftime(mtime, "%c") | fields status, ha_group_name, consumer_name, duration_since_last, mtime

`idx_mq` source="mqsubmission:hagroup:consumers_keepalive" $tk_ha_group_name$ $tk_ha_registered_consumer$ | eval status=if(info_search_time-mtime>=10*60, "offline", "online") | table _time, consumer_name, ha_group_name, status | bucket _time span=1m | stats count by _time, ha_group_name, consumer_name, status | timechart minspan=5m count by status
